events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all and I would like to get a refund. Please advise on the process.
The customer's message mentions wanting a refund due to sizing issues, marking this case under the Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Linda to handle the refund request promptly.

To proceed with your refund, may I have the order number and confirmation that the product is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 87451236. The jacket is brand new, still with tags and in the original box. The size is simply too small for me.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we will send to your email to send the jacket back within 14 days.

Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for the excellent support throughout this process.
The case has been formally closed following customer confirmation of refund receipt and satisfaction with the service.
